events.message: We have successfully received your application for the software engineer position. Thank you for your interest in joining our engineering team.
Your application has been categorized under the engineering department, specifically for a developer role requiring strong software and devops skills.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to your case to assist you through the upcoming recruitment steps.
We successfully completed the initial screening of your profile and you meet the basic qualifications required for this software engineer position.
Thank you for promptly responding to our screening questions. Your enthusiasm for the role is much appreciated by the hiring team.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 20th at 10 AM UTC with our senior engineering team to evaluate your coding and problem-solving skills.
The technical interview went well. The panel was impressed with your approach to software development and your knowledge of DevOps practices.
We have scheduled your HR interview for May 25th at 3 PM UTC to discuss your career goals and company culture fit.
Your HR interview was completed successfully. The recruiter mentioned your professional attitude and alignment with our company values.
We are pleased to propose you an offer for the software engineer position including a competitive salary and comprehensive benefits.
Thank you for your positive feedback on the offer. You have indicated enthusiasm and willingness to join our engineering team.
The candidate has officially accepted our software engineer job offer, and we are excited to welcome them aboard.
Onboarding process has begun, including setting up accounts, meeting the team, and scheduling training sessions to integrate the new engineer swiftly.
The hire for the software engineer position is now closed successfully. The new employee has started and is contributing positively to our engineering projects.
